Activity: Check emails and respond to any urgent inquiries. Review progress on the data quality issue tracking system.
Continue developing the centralized tracking system. Define the necessary fields: issue description, affected data elements, date of detection, reporter information, and root cause analysis findings.
Email @dba-1 to request assistance in setting up a basic database for the centralized tracking system. Topic: Data Quality Issue Tracking System Database Setup.

Prepare a draft communication to be sent to all users (clinical staff, data entry personnel, etc.) outlining the new data quality issue reporting process and the importance of feedback. @clinlead-1 to review content for clinical accuracy and tone.
Work with @dba-1 to establish a tracking system using the existing database infrastructure for data quality issues. If that's impossible then create a simple EXCEL spread sheet.
Revise the draft communication based on @clinlead-1's feedback. Ensure it is clear, concise, and encourages participation.
Test the centralized tracking system by manually entering a few sample data quality issues to ensure all fields are functioning correctly.
